summary: This document is an email correspondence between Amanda Kirby and Richard Kahn regarding an expected wire transfer of $20,000,000 to a savings account. Amanda Kirby acknowledges the communication and inquires about the source of the funds.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is communicating about a wire transfer and is associated with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is expecting a wire transfer and is requesting confirmation when it arrives.

connections.description: Amanda Kirby and Richard Kahn are engaged in a business communication regarding a financial transaction.

events.title: Expected Wire Transfer
events.description: Richard Kahn informs Amanda Kirby about an expected wire transfer of $20,000,000 to a savings account.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is associated with Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
Richard Kahn is associated with HBRK Associates Inc.
A wire transfer of $20,000,000 is expected to be received.
The communication is marked as confidential.
